Panel.Name: FileMenu
Panel.Label: Toolbar (Main Menu)
Panel.Description: The horizontal menu bar displayed at the top of the screen

Panel.Name: Toolbar
Panel.Label: Toolbar (Primary)
Panel.Description: The main toolbar, displayed across the top of the map

Panel.Name: ToolbarSecondary
Panel.Label: Toolbar (Secondary)
Panel.Description: The secondary toolbar, displayed beneath the main toolbar

Panel.Name: Statusbar
Panel.Label: Status Bar
Panel.Description: The status bar, displayed below the map

Panel.Name: OverviewMap
Panel.Label: Map (Overview)
Panel.Description: The dialog containing the overview map

Panel.Name: TaskPane
Panel.Label: Task Pane
Panel.Description: The panel displaying the task pane
